welcome_message_body: Welcome to Levallois-Perret, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, lively markets, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and business aviation, offering VIP services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mostly used for low-cost airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited to certain areas or have a time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and most iconic terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, featuring a unique circular design.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, with seven sub-terminals serving a variety of airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.
